properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 18 at 9:29AM AKST until February 19 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very
difficult. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches are
expected. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times.

* WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 40 mph will cause
whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the
snow is likely. Conditions will improve Wednesday as winds
decrease.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY
